name: Shadow Blade
description: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: The wielder becomes invisible and gains a movement speed bonus. Grants phase movement while invisible.
notes: Does not interrupt the wielder's channeling abilities upon cast
Recasting the ability refreshes the buff duration
The caster gains phased movement while invisible
Picking up, dropping, or selling items does not break the invisibility
During the fade time, casting abilities or items does not break the invisibility
Invisibility breaks upon reaching the cast point of abilities or items after fade time
Invisibility breaks upon reaching the attack point of an attack
The attack breaking invisibility deals physical spell damage bonus with the attack
Adds physical conditional attack damage to the next attack while invisible
Does not interact with critical strike or percentage-based bonus attack damage
Interacts with lifesteal, cleave, splash, and damage block
Does not affect buildings or ward-type units
Shares cooldown with other invisibility items

additionalInfo: Shares cooldown with other invisibility items
In DotA, this item was named Lothar's Edge, referencing Sir Anduin Lothar from Warcraft
Active ability is based on the Blademaster's Wind Walk
Kunkka has a cosmetic item based on Shadow Blade
